attributes.action: S.O.S (Stop Our Suffering) GoviaThameslinkRailway and Network Rail
attributes.additional_details:
I can't be bothered with the facts and figures. 
No-one can be bothered with the facts and figures anymore.
We just want this sorted once and for all as it's affecting and ruining everyday life for tens of thousands of people.
To put it bluntly, why should the corporate issues of a few affect the well-being of so many when all we are trying to do is to get to work, visit loved ones, have days out, go to sporting events and, most importantly, be able to get home to our families and friends.
attributes.background:
Parliament have had their debate - but still nothing has changed since that debate back in September.
Signatures on the last petition to get this situation resolved numbered just shy of 14,000.
Can we hit the magical 100,000 signatures this time?
CAN PEOPLE POWER WIN?
